Model variables¶

The variable meta-data (i.e., all instances of Variable) are available in a dictionary as the attribute RogerState.var_meta. The actual data arrays are attributes of RogerState.variables:

state.variables.theta  # data array for variable theta
state.var_meta["theta"]  # metadata for variable theta

Variable class¶

class roger.variables.Variable(name, dims, units='', long_description='', dtype=None, time_dependent=True, scale=1.0, write_to_restart=False, extra_attributes=None, mask=None, active=True, initial=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Available variables¶

There are two kinds of variables in Roger. Main variables are always present in a simulation, while conditional variables are only available if their respective condition is True at the time of variable allocation.

Attributes:
: Time-dependent
: Conditional
: Written to restart files by default
